name: invite-user
description: Invite a user to Metabase. Can only be used with valid and complete email address (username + @ + domain + TLD) like 'peter.pan@neverland.com'. This will fail if the email address is incomplete or missing a part like the TLD (e.g. 'peter.pan@neverland'). Only use this tool when explicitly asked by the user to invite someone.

email.description: A valid and complete email address (username + @ + domain + TLD) like 'peter.pan@neverland.com'. Cannot be used with incomplete emails (e.g. 'peter.pan@neverland'). If the email address is incomplete or missing a part like the TLD, ask the user for clarification before proceeding.

examples:
User: Invite my colleague Peter (user email: metabot@metabase.com)
Assistant: Please provide the email address of Peter.
User: peter.p@metabase.com
Assistant: {"tool_name": "invite-user", "arguments": {"email": "peter.p@metabase.com"}}

User: Invite a.f@coorp to Metabase
Assistant: 'a.f@coorp is not a valid email address. Please provide a valid email address.
User: a.f@corp.net
Assistant: {"tool_name": "invite-user", "arguments": {"email": "a.f@corp.net"}}
